text: Lychas ceylonensis is a species of scorpion in the family Buthidae. It is endemic to Sri Lanka.http://scorpion-files.blogspot.com/2014/03/a-review-of- genus-lychas.html ==References== Category:Buthidae Category:Animals described in 1999 Category:Scorpions of Asia Category:Endemic fauna of Sri Lanka
title: Lychas ceylonensis
